title: General Knowledge
description: Test your knowledge across a variety of topics!

questions.text: What is the capital of France?

answers.explanation: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France.

questions.text: Identify this famous playwright who wrote 'Romeo and Juliet'.

answers.explanation: William Shakespeare was an English poet, playwright, and actor. He is widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language.

questions.text: Which of these planets is the largest in our solar system?

media.caption: The largest planet in our solar system

answers.explanation: Jupiter is the fifth planet from the Sun and the largest in the Solar System.
